summary: The implementation addresses most requirements with comprehensive backend and frontend changes for profile photo upload, landing page preview, and package assignment features. Some features are partially implemented or have incomplete evidence in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply proper styling consistent with the dashboard design using yellow and green accents for profile photo upload section
missing_requirements.reason: ProfileSettings.tsx shows yellow-500 color for title but no clear evidence of green accents being consistently applied throughout the profile photo upload UI components as specified

missing_requirements.requirement: Create an admin function or initialization script that assigns Platinum package to user with email rudrapratapsingh789.063@gmail.com
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo diff is truncated and does not show evidence of an admin function specifically for assigning packages by email or any implementation targeting the specific email address

missing_requirements.requirement: Add Preview button next to each landing page in My Landing Pages section with modal overlay option
missing_requirements.reason: MyLandingPages.tsx shows Preview button that opens in new tab but no evidence of modal overlay implementation as an alternative option mentioned in requirements

missing_requirements.requirement: Include proper SEO meta tags in the shareable landing page route
missing_requirements.reason: LandingPagePreview.tsx shows basic title and meta description implementation, but requirements specify proper SEO meta tags which typically includes Open Graph, Twitter cards, canonical URLs, etc. Evidence only shows basic meta tags

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module implementation for handling UserProfile schema changes
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention or require any data migration functionality. This appears to be an implementation detail added beyond the specified requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Increment landing page visit functionality with useIncrementLandingPageVisit mutation hook
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-253 mentions returning visitCount, there is no requirement to increment visit counts automatically when previewing pages. This auto-increment behavior was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Edit functionality for landing pages with search parameter routing
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-251 specifies Edit button, but the implementation includes query parameter-based edit routing with search parameters which goes beyond basic Edit button navigation requirement
